name: tsp heaped
desc: A teaspoon piled above the rim.

name: tsp scant
desc: A teaspoon that is slightly under-filled.

name: tbsp heaped
desc: A tablespoon piled above the rim.

name: tbsp scant
desc: A tablespoon that is slightly under-filled.

name: Small
desc: A small version of an item.

name: Large
desc: A large version of an item.

desc: An extra-large version of an item.

name: Knob
desc: A lump of butter, approx. 1.5 tbsp.

name: Glug
desc: A hearty, unmeasured pour from a bottle.

name: Handful
desc: Amount held in one cupped hand.

name: To Taste
desc: Add until flavour is correct for you.

name: Clove
desc: A segment of a garlic bulb.

name: Bag
desc: A commercial bag of an item.

name: Pack
desc: A commercial pack of an item.

name: Tin Drained
desc: A standard tin can drained (e.g., beans).

desc: A standard tin can drained (e.g., beans).

name: Head
